Instructions: Using the provided web search results, write a comprehensive reply to the given prompt. Make sure to cite results using [[number](URL)] notation after the reference. If the provided search results refer to multiple subjects with the same name, write separate answers for each subject.
Prompt: Hello

Hello is an expression or gesture of greeting, used interjectionally in various situations, such as in person, on the telephone, or to express surprise. It is also used in songs like "Easy On Me" by Adele. [[1](https://www.merriam-webster.com/dictionary/hello)] [[2](https

Hello is an expression or gesture of greeting, used interjectionally in various situations, such as in person, on the telephone, or to express surprise. Its origin can be traced back to Old High German and it has been influenced by an earlier form, holla, whose origin is in French. [[3](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hello)]

Why are giving the meaning of hello
I just wanna talk to you, make a response
I apologize if my previous response did not meet your expectations. I am here to help you with any questions or information you need. How can I assist you today?
